section_title: APPROVAL OF THE DRAFT REPORT OF IPCC-26
sentences: On Friday, IPCC Secretary Renate Christ introduced the report of the IPCC's 26th meeting (IPCC-XXVII/Doc.2) and invited comments.

Belgium requested, and the plenary agreed, that the IPCC-26 report should include the IPCC's decision to subject the report on the meeting on new emissions scenarios that took place in the Netherlands in September 2007 to peer review, and that the cover of that latter report will make explicit mention of the peer review.
